Lyric:
[by:埃菲尔下的惠]
[00:00.00]Life moves so fast
[00:07.26]Let’s take our foot up off the gas
[00:10.13]Slow down the motor and relax
[00:12.01]Have fun ,be wild, and love
[00:14.44]Soakin’ all the little things up
[00:16.58]I just wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[00:20.11]All I wanna do is make ya ya
[00:22.72]I wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[00:26.04]Every thing is better when ya ya ya ya, smile
[00:32.62]All I wanna do is make ya ya ya ya ya, smile
[00:38.60]When you do, I do it with ya ya ya ya
[00:40.81]Take out the trash, load it up leave it in the past
[00:45.24]Start over freshen feel the breeze, the sun it’s free to love
[00:49.89]Soakin’ all the simple things up
[00:52.45]I just wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[00:56.05]All I wanna do is make ya ya
[00:59.03]I wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[01:02.17]Everything is better when ya ya ya ya, smile
[01:08.46]All I wanna do is make ya ya ya ya ya, smile
[01:14.55]When you do, I do it with ya ya ya ya
[01:19.61]You like it don't ya
[01:22.75]Looks so good on ya
[01:25.68]I love it when you smile
[01:29.88]
[01:40.25]You got that lightning in a bottle
[01:43.10]And yet you're lookin’ like a model
[01:45.71]You look like you just hit the lotto
[01:48.01]I don’t wanna make you crazy, make you lazy
[01:50.21]Make you pay me, make you lead or make you follow
[01:52.36]I just wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[01:56.19]All I wanna do is make ya ya ya
[01:58.93]I wanna make you smile for me smile for me
[02:02.14]Every thing is better when ya ya ya ya, smile
[02:08.47]All I wanna do is make ya ya ya ya ya, smile
[02:14.55]When you do, i do it with ya ya ya ya
[02:19.61]You like it don’t ya
[02:22.73]Just soak it on ya
[02:25.73]I love it when you smile
